easy.name: Easy
easy.description: The easiest mode for CV2R. Lots of hearts, reduced penalties, and a little more sanity around the enemization. A good place to start for brand new players.

standard.name: Standard
standard.description: The most common way to run CV2R. Some heart buffs to keep the game moving, but that's all the help you'll get. Merchant prices and enemy HP are randomized.

hard.name: Hard
hard.description: Ready for a challenge? No help with your heart grinds. Merchant prices and enemy HP randomized.
